author: Edward Doan
comment: Once the software update arrived on December 17, 2014 and my Moto 360 updated to Android Wear Lollipop, this watch face appeared. Nice, clean design. I haven't seen the race circuit background, but I guess this only appears on days when the Porsche factory team is racing?
title: Works fine on Moto 360

author: Steven Tilly
comment: Moto 360 2nd Gen. Has a black quadrant at the right hand side that "matches" the one the 360 always has at the bottom. This makes the bottom/right of the face square while the rest is round. Must surely be a bug rather than a design feature. Will not be using this face as it stands.
title: Does not look good.

author: Suresh Hariharan
comment: I had been using this face and loving it as my primary watchface since it came out. Unfortunately after the recent 5.1.1 OS update, the alignment of the time and notifications is no longer correct. Dropping my rating from five stars to two stars until this watchface gets updated to work properly with 5.1.1.
title: Alignment is wrong on Moto 360

author: brandon gatto
comment: As simple as it is and as many problems as people have,its really nice to see big companies like this embracing new technology. Once watch makers realize they can actually make money from designing smart watches well all benefit. keep it up, Porsche. Love the watch face.
title: A good start

author: Ziad Qushair
comment: Seriously Porsche??? It does not display properly on the Huawei Watch (or the Moto360 judging by other comments).  Fix it or stick to making cars!
title: Rubbish

author: Michael Smith
comment: This worked great on my older Urbane, but my new Nixon has an issue with part of the graphic cut off on the right and the bottom cut off as well. Otherwise looks great!
title: Graphic issue

author: Joseph Poulima
comment: It's an alright watch face. Tells time, etc. Simple logo on the face. No customizability. Can't even change from white to black. Works correctly though on the Moto 360
title: Pretty basic watch face

author: theHilsNZ
comment: Used to love it, but it's broken on the Moto 360 gen 2 and Huawei watches - has a black quadrant down the right hand side, and across the bottom. Such a shame, and surely an easy fix.

author: John Beckles
comment: There is a black square covering the right side and bottom side of the watch. If it weren't for that I would be really happy with the overall simple design.
title: Doesn't work well on Huawei watch

author: Ovidiu Bledea
comment: The white background becomes a white square on black background in the button right corner. I'm guessing it was made for lower resolutions than the Huawei Watch? Useless right now.
title: Broken on Huawei Watch

author: Brian Daly
comment: Nice looking face but unfortunately does not work on a Huawei device. There's an ugly black quadrant on the right hand side.
title: Doesn't work on Huawei watches

author: Teodor Mihai
comment: I loved this watch face on my LG G, but it doesn't work with my new Asus ZenWatch 3. It's unusable.
title: Broken

author: Anshul Jain
comment: Massive design problem on the moto 360. Please fix it.
title: Please fix the design

author: Andy Hudson
comment: Don't read the negative reviews about this not working. They were people who couldn't read. This needs android wear 5 to work. It's clean and crisp. Nice watch.
title: My new favourite

author: Melissa Kurosawa
comment: On the right and bottom sides of this watch face, there are black bars which make it look ugly, I am using a Huawei Watch
title: Black bars

author: Richard Nocon
comment: Sweet n simple. 11/15 downgrade due to misalignment on my new 360...fix please
title: Sweet

author: Steven Lightfoot
comment: Same black quadrant as reported on moto. It's as though it's trying to display the square version on a round watch
title: Not good on Huawei

author: Todd Sumner
comment: Love the face. Works on my 360. One question, how do I get the 24hr display? 5 stars when I can get 24hr.

author: Chris P.
comment: Don't bother downloading if you have a Hauwei watch. It displays half centered and won't work
title: Does not work with Hauwei watches

author: Kirill Kushch
comment: Black bar on the right side
title: Does not show correctly on Moto 360 2nd gen

author: Joe Miller
comment: On my RunIQ, appears to try and use the square version of the watch face, looks terrible.

author: G Baker
comment: I like it.  It works fine. But it would be good to have settings options to change text size and it needs option to display battery status. Both watch and phone.
title: Good but could be better.

comment: How do get it onto my Lg watch tried everything???
title: Lg watch won't work?

author: Ashvin Uday
comment: After having reinstalled twice, the watchface still doesn't come up on the watch, nor can I find the app on the phone
title: Doesn't work on my moto360 :(

author: Wouter Dam
comment: Needs an update to work with Huawei Watch, layout has a nasty looking background

author: Andrew G.
comment: I love Porsche and am thrilled for the watch face. Works great, very no nonsense. Can't wait for more!
title: Perfect on LG G Watch R

author: Sandesh Somashekar
comment: Watch face was coming up with square corners.
title: Did not work on round face watch.

author: Yury H
comment: Background cuts off on the right and the time is not centered
title: Fossil Q Founder

author: Prajyot Hanchanale
comment: Doesn't work,  can't find this face
title: Not worked

author: Sultan Baghdady
comment: This face is clean and simple. And I wish you make a black face please
title: Black color pls

author: kody mullins
comment: The application doesn't properly fit my watch. Glitch.
title: Huawei watch

author: FS Studios
comment: Would Love to see a Black option. Black background, gray porsche outline white numbers
title: Great Design

author: Randy Shoai
comment: A dark version would be great for o-led displays as well as more options. Also buggy in LG G R.
title: Stylish but limited

author: T Freit
comment: Please fix. Please fix
title: Doesn't work on moto 360 2nd gen

author: Kevin Sadigh
comment: Won't work
title: Does not work on lg g watch

author: Dilshan de Mel
comment: It is really great for car lovers. I personally feel if you can have a black option too. Or more different watch faces.
title: Superb.

author: ahmed sedeek
comment: Not work on ma device archos titanium 40c

author: Nate Starrett
comment: Black band on right side as well as the bottom. Plus unlike what shown at store, only display the time.
title: Moro 360 1st gen

author: Tiago Goulart
comment: Has a black list on the right.
title: Bad programming

author: Marcus Genberg
comment: But! Please make all of the characters bigger! They only occupy half of the screen and could make use of more of the screen space! Please change it for the better
title: Super nice
